items.title: Online Book Query
items.description:
**An android application** to search for books using the Google Books API.

- Provides the complete features of the **Google Books** API
- searching, filtering, sorting, etc.
- Provides history functionality to keep track of the search query.

items.title: Blogging Platform
items.description:
**A complete reactive Blogging Platform using the *TALL stack*.**
 Features:

 - Rich text post creation/editing
 - Comment system
 - Like/dislike System
 - Followers System
 - Direct Messaging System
 - Search indexing system

items.title: Markdown driven Blog
items.description:
A **Markdown driven blog**, *no database* no hussle, written in **Laravel** as a backend and **Vue** as a frontend. Smooth single page application. With **SSR** support.
Has a companion application, which is a visual studio code extension for article creation and editing.

Features:

 - Easily add posts by just writing a markdown file and placing it in the views directory
 - Mermaid diagraming support, powered by Mermaidjs
 - Yaml Frontmatter is everything needed to categorise and process the article
 - Powered by The League Commonmark and Torchlight syntax highlighter
 - **Easy to use**

items.title: React Weather App
items.description:
Reactive Weather Application with **GPS support** using Reactjs, with fully dynamic, responsive and appealing design. 

Uses an accurate GPS locational API to provide accurate data from OpenWeatherMap API.

items.title: Bookread Keeper
items.description:
A book-reading application to keep track of read books, written purely in javascript and css.
 - Lightweight and easy to use.

items.title: Pomodoro Timer
items.description:
A pomodoro timer to help with productivity and time management, written purely in javascript and css, made as part of a *Javascript* coding challenge.

 - Lightweight and easy to use.
 - Zen mode, with ambient music player
 - Audiovisual progress bar

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description:
This portfolio you are a browsing at this moment, is a simplistic, responsive yet stylish **Single Page Application**.

Written primarily in Vue and TailwindCSS.
